scripts.windows_dev: set NODE_ENV=development && set SEED=false && nodemon app.js
scripts.windows_dev_seed: set NODE_ENV=development && set SEED=true && nodemon app.js
scripts.windows_prod: set NODE_ENV=production && set SEED=false && nodemon app.js
scripts.windows_prod_seed: set NODE_ENV=production && set SEED=true && nodemon app.js
scripts.mac_dev: set NODE_ENV=development && set SEED=false && nodemon app.js
scripts.mac_dev_seed: set NODE_ENV=development && set SEED=true && nodemon app.js
scripts.mac_prod: set NODE_ENV=production && set SEED=false && nodemon app.js
scripts.mac_prod_seed: set NODE_ENV=production && set SEED=true && nodemon app.js
